general_info.summary: This text outlines various aspects of a nursing program, including key areas like global knowledge seeking, recruitment, banking and postal services, visa and medical insurance guidelines, and observership programs. It also highlights "Paramarsh," a mentoring portal, potential career paths such as Nursing Incharge and Nursing Supervisor, and mentions an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA for program graduates, encouraging individuals to pursue a career in nursing.
